value:
$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|Ah, there's the shrine now, Embla!$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|I grow increasingly exhausted with
this venture... Who chooses to walk
such a distance?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_NewYear23,Face|We're nearly there, Lady Embla!
Only a bit farther now.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|Walking this far makes me warm,
and... *yawn* I get sleepy making the
journey alongside so many people.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|I wish for Yarne's good health,
long life, luck on the battlefield, and
for him to find a suitable match...$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|M-Mother! That's quite enough!
Please! I didn't mean any offense
with what I said before...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|We've arrived, everyone! Now that
we're here, I suppose I ought to
decide what it is I should I wish for...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|I plan on wishing for the good health
and welfare of all mortals. You plan
to wish the same, right, Embla?$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|Why wish for such a thing? Even if
they are granted good health, all of
them will be dead soon enough...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アスク|Ah, so you wish for them to not die
at all. Why not wish them long lives,
then, hm?$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|...What leads you to believe that
was my intent?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_NewYear23,Face|Lady Embla! When you make your
wish, you must give a coin as tribute.
I have some ready for your use.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|Elm, even you've— Hmph. Fine.
Give me a coin...$k$p$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|I will give a coin as well... May it
serve to make my humble wish come
true, if the shrine's deity wills it...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|What did you wish for, Ash?$k$p$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|M-me? Oh, well... It may be too great
of a request for me to have any hope
of it actually coming true, but...still...$k$pI wished for the opportunity to gather
together like this to ring in the new
year again for many years to come...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アスク,ch00_42_Ask_MF_Pair,Face|That is a great wish, Ash. And I agree!
Let's plan on visiting the shrine again
next year—and every year after.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_NewYear23,Face|Yes! It's a plan...Father.$k$p$Sbs150|
